author: Staff Reporter
text:
Interview to recruit women for posts of school noon meal organiser and school noon meal cooking assistant that were postponed due to government employees strike, would begin on Wednesday.

The interviews were originally scheduled to be held on 11, 12, 15 and 16 but postponed due to the strike. Now the applicants have been informed that the interview for the posts of organiser would be held in the respective blocks of the applicants on Wednesday and Thursday and for the posts of cooking assistant, in the respective blocks on Friday.
title: Noon meal staff recruitment from today
